<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd</date_format><map display_value="em60d load">c1750b70dbdea810bc76d54b5e961963</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>u___of_clean_r_since_last_str</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

	// Add your code here
	gs.info('alert' + current.u_last_alert_date);
	var gcdt = new GlideDate(); 
	gcdt.setValue(current.u_last_alert_date);
	current.u_last_alert_date = gcdt.getValue();
	gs.info('alert' + current.u_last_alert_date);
	return ""; // return the value to be put into the target field

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>u_emd60_upld</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mikeb</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-10 22:00:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>76958b70dbdea810bc76d54b5e9619cc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>u___of_clean_r_since_last_str</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AML Transaction Case" source="x_snc_aml_txn">eddba5a8db5268101161f3e51d9619b9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AML Transaction Case">eddba5a8db5268101161f3e51d9619b9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_76958b70dbdea810bc76d54b5e9619cc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mikeb</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-11 14:42:27</sys_updated_on><target_field>last_alert_date</target_field><target_table>x_snc_aml_txn_em60d</target_table><use_source_script>false</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>
